type.description: SQL 2016 table constraint category (Part 2, Clause 11). PRIMARY_KEY: uniquely identifies each row. FOREIGN_KEY: enforces referential integrity to another table. UNIQUE: ensures distinct values. CHECK: validates column values against an expression. NOT_NULL: prohibits null values.

onDelete.description: SQL 2016 referential action on delete (Part 2, Clause 11.8). Applies only to FOREIGN_KEY constraints. CASCADE: delete child rows. SET_NULL: nullify foreign key. SET_DEFAULT: reset to default. RESTRICT/NO_ACTION: reject if referenced rows exist.

onUpdate.description: SQL 2016 referential action on update (Part 2, Clause 11.8). Applies only to FOREIGN_KEY constraints. Same values as onDelete, applied when the referenced primary key value is updated.
